title: The whole comical works of Monsr. Scarron ... a great part of which never before in English / translated by Mr. Tho. Brown, Mr. Savage, and others.
author: Scarron, Monsieur, 1610-1660.
publisher: Printed for S. and J. Sprint ... J. Nicholson ... R. Parker ... and Benj. Tooke ...,
notes: Two pages of ms. inserted following p. 120.
Reproduction of original in Newberry Library.
(from t.p.) I. His comical romance of a company of stageplayers. In three parts, compleat -- II. All his novels and histories -- III. His select letters, characters, &c.
